titles.title: Congratulating and honoring Argonne National Laboratory for achieving 75 years of scientific excellence.
Congratulating and honoring Argonne National Laboratory for achieving 75 years of scientific excellence.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology.

bill.summary: This resolution congratulates and honors Argonne National Laboratory on the 75th anniversary of the laboratory and wishes the laboratory continued success in helping the people of the United States unlock new scientific and technological frontiers that secure their energy future.
